text:
Ayurvedic Treatment & Herbs 12+
[
rahul baweja
](https://apps.apple.com/cr/developer/rahul-baweja/id804610215)
Diseñada para iPad
-
- Gratis
Capturas de pantalla
Descripción
This is new application for the Ayurveda.
This application contains several ayurvedic therapies, tips, treatments and medicines which will definitely helps you to overcome your problems in an easier and better way.
So, for all those who believes in the magic of Ayurveda, install the app now.
This app contains all the detailed information about all the diseases, their treatments and almost all the herbs.
Using this application you can get the following information:
1) Definition of diseases
2) Causes of of diseases
3) Symptoms of diseases
4) Ayurvedic View of diseases
5) Diet and Lifestyle Advice of diseases
6) Home Remedies of of diseases
7) Ayurvedic Herbs
Novedades
Versión 1.1
This app has been updated by Apple to display the Apple Watch app icon.
fixed up few bugs.
Privacidad de la app
El desarrollador (rahul baweja) no ofreció detalles sobre sus prácticas de privacidad y el envío de datos a Apple.
No se proporcionaron detalles
El desarrollador tendrá que proporcionar detalles sobre la privacidad cuando envíe su próxima actualización de app.
